column7: scribe, expert in the Jewish law
column8: Then Jesus said to them, "Therefore every scribe who has become a disciple to the kingdom of heaven is like a man who is the owner of a house, who withdraws old and new things from his treasure."

column7: Holy Spirit, Spirit of God, Spirit of the Lord
column8: After he was baptized, Jesus came up immediately from the water, and behold, the heavens were opened to him. He saw the Spirit of God coming down like a dove and alighting on him.
